articles.title: Morgan Wallen Won't Be Eligible for 2021 ACM Awards After Racial Slur - Billboard
articles.description: In a quick and decisive move, the Academy of Country Music has barred Morgan Wallen from “involvement and eligibility” in the upcoming 56th annual ACM Awards.

First-round voting for the ACM Awards  has already concluded (Jan. 19-26). Second-round voting is set for Feb. 10-17. Final-round voting is set for March 17-24. The awards will air April 18 on CBS.
